## 🧑‍💻 User Story

**As a** [type of user]  
**I want to** [do something]  
**So that** [some benefit]

- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Criterion 3

Add any relevant context, screenshots, or links.
